Scatter Charts

Scatter charts compare two numeric values. The data styles for the subsequent examples is:

{
  "seats_by_distance": {
    "renderer": "scatter_chart"
  }
}

Run as a nested subtable 

explore flights : [dep_time : @2003-02, origin_code : 'SFO']
| reduce
  seats_by_distance_scatter_chart is (reduce
    seats is aircraft.aircraft_models.seats
    distance is distance
    route_count is count(distinct concat(origin_code, destination_code))
  )
Error: Error: Error(s) compiling model: FILE: internal://internal.malloy line 2: extraneous input 'explore' expecting {, EXPLORE, QUERY, IMPORT, ';'} | explore flights : [dep_time : @2003-02, origin_code : 'SFO'] | ^

Run as a trellis 

explore flights : [dep_time : @2003-02, origin_code : 'ATL' | 'SFO' | 'SJC' | 'BUR']
| reduce
  origin_code
  seats_by_distance_scatter_chart is (reduce
    seats is aircraft.aircraft_models.seats
    distance is distance
    route_count is count(distinct concat(origin_code, destination_code))
  )
Error: Error: Error(s) compiling model: FILE: internal://internal.malloy line 2: extraneous input 'explore' expecting {, EXPLORE, QUERY, IMPORT, ';'} | explore flights : [dep_time : @2003-02, origin_code : 'ATL' | 'SFO' | 'SJC' | 'BUR'] | ^
